医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
每日步数越高，抑郁症状越少一项系统评价显示，每天步行 7,000 步以上与较低的抑郁风险相关，这凸显了体力活动在心理健康中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Higher-daily-step-counts-linked-with-fewer-depressive-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Higher-daily-step-counts-linked-with-fewer-depressive-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aaa3725f-0596-44ab-9538-5a3dd511c7c7 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 08:28:00 -0500 Higher daily step counts associated with fewer depressive symptoms
综合研究强调了成人多动症治疗的有效性和局限性研究结果表明，兴奋剂和阿托莫西汀可以有效减轻多动症症状，尽管非药物疗法显示出长期疗效的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Compliance-study-highlights-effectness-and-limitations-of-ADHD-treatments-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Compressive-study-highlights-effectness-and-limitations-of-ADHD-treatments-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0af713ee-7f16-4059-8c2f-35460583b570 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 08:01:00 -0500 Comprehensive study highlights effectiveness and limitations of ADHD treatments in adults
基于香菇的补充剂可能有助于预防肝损伤进展AHCC 具有通过抑制 HSC 激活和调节参与肝损伤的关键途径来预防肝纤维化进展的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Shiitake-based-supplement-may-help-prevent-liver-damage-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Shiitake-based-supplement-may-help-prevent-liver-damage-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=554cfa0d-24be-485d-a32b-f96621e29115 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 07:25:00 -0500 Shiitake-based supplement may help prevent liver damage progression
Amira 软件版本 2024.2：增强超微结构分析Amira 软件版本 2024.2 提供突破性的人工智能增强功能和先进工具，改变细胞超微结构分析和研究工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Amira-Software-Version-20242-Enhancing-ultrastruct-analysis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Amira-Software-Version-20242-Enhancing-ultrastruct-analysis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=36ed2c54-db74-4955-925b-3136d49125e7 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 06:38:00 -0500 Amira Software Version 2024.2: Enhancing ultrastructure analysis
主观步行速度是一种快速、无需设备的工具，可用于识别代谢健康风险该研究揭示了步行速度与肥胖的代谢疾病风险之间存在密切关联，表明快走是一项重要的健康干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Subjective-walking-speed-is-a-quick-equipment-free-tool-for-identifying-metabolic-health-risks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Subjective-walking-speed-is-a-quick-equipment-free-tool-for-identifying-metabolic-health-risks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0710c05-6f82-47e0-a0d8-fc615bec9f01 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 06:35:00 -0500 Subjective walking speed is a quick, equipment-free tool for identifying metabolic health risks
美国如何失去对禽流感的控制，为另一场大流行奠定了基础10 月份在威斯康星州举行的世界乳品博览会上，当农民向基思·波尔森展示手机上的图像时，基思·波尔森惊得下巴都掉下来了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/How-America-lost-control-of-the-bird-flu-setting-the-stage-for-another-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/How-America-lost-control-of-the-bird-flu-setting-the-stage-for-another-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=963bdd50-5043-4b82-b1a2-f2a7ff​​eaeaf3 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 06:07:00 -0500 How America lost control of the bird flu, setting the stage for another pandemic
减少手部卫生监测可以节省医院的时间和金钱根据《美国感染控制杂志》发表的一项新研究，医院的手卫生 (HH) 监测可能会显着减少，从而使感染预防人员能够将努力转向质量改进和患者安全举措。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Reducing-hand-hygiene-monitoring-could-save-hospitals-time-and-money.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Reducing-hand-hygiene-monitoring-could-save-hospitals-time-and-money.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47157fb4-49b0-42a1-8a3f-489f6dab7cf4 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 02:13:00 -0500 Reducing hand hygiene monitoring could save hospitals time and money
研究表明牛肉可以成为有益心脏健康的饮食的一部分最近发表的一项全面的系统综述和荟萃分析增加了越来越多的证据，表明可以在有益心脏健康的饮食中享用牛肉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Study-shows-beef-can-be-part-of-a-heart-healthy-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Study-shows-beef-can-be-part-of-a-heart-healthy-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38ce4b77-6f03-4c14-b5ba-cb1f632cf3e4 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 02:06:00 -0500 Study shows beef can be part of a heart-healthy diet
研究发现权力驱动的用户在社交媒体上分享更多虚假新闻伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，受权力和影响他人欲望驱使的人更有可能在社交媒体上分享虚假新闻帖子。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Study-finds-power-motivated-users-share-more-fake-news-on-social-media.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Study-finds-power-motivated-users-share-more-fake-news-on-social-media.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0395630f-a17a-4793-92d1-cf2381142967 Fri, 20 Dec 2024 01:23:24 -0500
索拉非尼联合 SBRT 可提高肝细胞癌患者的生存率III 期 NRG-RTOG 1112 临床研究的最新结果表明，在索拉非尼全身治疗的基础上添加立体定向全身放疗（SBRT）可显着改善局部晚期肝细胞癌患者的无进展生存期（PFS）和进展时间(HCC) 与单独索拉非尼相比。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Adding-SBRT-to-sorafenib-improves-survival-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241220/Adding-SBRT-to-sorafenib-improves-survival-in-hepatocellular-carcinoma-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71d1f748-4045-4ba4-95a9-7831325b1cda Fri, 20 Dec 2024 01:20:26 -0500 Adding SBRT to sorafenib improves survival in hepatocellular carcinoma patients
